title: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
description: Financial benefit of Rs. 6000/- per year in three equal installments to all landholding farmers' families across the country.

title: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
description: A yield-based crop insurance scheme providing financial support to farmers suffering from crop loss/damage due to natural calamities.

title: Soil Health Card Scheme
description: Provides information to farmers on the nutrient status of their soil along with recommendations on appropriate dosage of nutrients.

title: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana (PKVY)
description: Promotes organic farming through a cluster approach and PGS certification to improve soil health and crop value.

title: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana (PMKSY)
description: Aimed at providing end-to-end solutions in the irrigation supply chain, covering water sources, distribution, and farm-level applications.

title: National Mission for Sustainable Agriculture (NMSA)
description: Focuses on climate change adaptation and promoting sustainable agriculture through optimized water and nutrient management.

title: Agri-Clinic and Agri-Business Centres (ACABC)
description: Provides self-employment opportunities to eligible agriculture graduates to support agricultural development and technology transfer.

title: National Bamboo Mission
description: Promotes the growth of the bamboo sector through an area-based, regionally differentiated strategy to increase income for farmers.

title: Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana (RKVY)
description: Provides states with flexibility and autonomy to plan and execute schemes that maximize returns to farmers based on local needs.

title: Kisan Credit Card (KCC)
description: Provides adequate and timely credit support from the banking system for agricultural and other allied requirements.

title: e-NAM (National Agriculture Market)
description: A pan-India electronic trading portal networking existing APMC mandis to create a unified national market for agricultural commodities.

title: PM Matsya Sampada Yojana
description: A landmark scheme for the sustainable and responsible development of the fisheries sector in India.

title: PM-KUSUM
description: Financial support for installing solar pumps and grid-connected solar power plants to ensure energy security for farmers.

title: Mission for Integrated Development of Horticulture (MIDH)
description: A centrally sponsored scheme for the holistic growth of the horticulture sector including fruits, vegetables, and flowers.

title: National Food Security Mission (NFSM)
description: Aimed at increasing the production of rice, wheat, pulses, coarse cereals, and commercial crops through area expansion and productivity enhancement.

title: Animal Husbandry Infrastructure Development Fund (AHIDF)
description: Incentivizes investments by entrepreneurs and MSMEs in dairy, meat processing, and animal feed plants.

title: PM Formalisation of Micro food processing Enterprises (PMFME)
description: Provides financial and technical support for the upgradation of micro food processing enterprises in rural areas.

title: Pradhan Mantri Annadata Aay Sanraksan Abhiyan (PM-AASHA)
description: Ensures remunerative prices to farmers for their produce, focusing on oilseeds and pulses.

title: Interest Subvention Scheme (ISS) for Farmers
description: Provides short-term crop loans up to Rs. 3 lakh at an effective interest rate of 4% per annum (after subvention).

title: National Livestock Mission
description: Focuses on sustainable development of the livestock sector, particularly poultry, piggery, and feed & fodder development.
